Transform a coverage value into char

Source: R/badge_params.R
badge_value.Rd

Outputs both values as both are used downstream by various other helpers. If the input values are NA or NULL it converts them to "unknown". If the values are greater than 100 or less than 0 it adjusts them to these values

Usage

badge_value(value, verbose = FALSE, call = rlang::caller_env())

Arguments

value

(numeric) coverage value. Can also be NA or NULL

verbose

(logical) if we want messages around the clamping. Default is FALSE.

call

(call) defaults to rlang::caller_env()

Value

a list with 2 element:

  • num: the value as numeric

  • char: the value as character

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
badge_value(26.78)
} # }
